name: Bearing the Hammer
description:
Bearing the Hammer

Created by Sebas van de Munt for the Minor Applied Game Design, Amsterdam University of Applied Sciences.
Version 1.0.1

Controls:
Run with WASD or the arrow keys
Jump with the spacebar
Smash with the left mouse button
Pull with the right mouse button
Hold one of the mouse buttons to charge the Powermeter
Climb ladders by pressing the W key
Pull a ball along by holding the right mouse button

Updated to version 1.0.1 on 09-04-2023: Trampoline jumping issues were fixed, some dialogue was added to explain gameplay elements more clearly, HUD issues in Bear Plaza were fixed, among other minor fixes.
